comment: Amazing professor that cares about the students, brough special guests to class time to let students get the chance to connect and network. Tests are based off of powerpoint slides. Go to class and youll be fine, but everything was posted online aswell

You can tell she really cares about her students and wants to make sure you do well. Not too many assignments and quizzes are straight off the powerpoints so just listen and pay attention and you should get an A

By far my favorite professor. she graded really easy. made sure everyone was prepared for quizzes. understanding if an assignment is late. once a week brought in guest speakers that often gave job opportunities. Very respectful towards her students and remembers details about them.

One of the most kindest professors and women I have ever met. She truly wants the best for her students and is always there for you. She has a lot of guest speakers come in from the sports world to give you amazing knowledge and future connections. She gives you very clear notes and she tries to make the class engaging and not awkward. 10/10
Professor McLeish was great! She's very respectful of students' time and is easy to talk to. There are also a lot of guest speakers that give valuable information on different careers in sports.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
